body:
On Fri, 20 Jun 2008 13:30:55 +0200, ZZ <qiuzhongzhu at shiep.edu.cn> wrote:


> dear all,
>
> I'm new to Ubuntu.
> download gendaylit.tar.Z from  
> http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/pub/generators/
> uncompress "gendaylit.tar.Z" file and get a folder named "gendaylit",  
> and then
> type "make" in command line, computer will display error:
>
> cc -Ae -g  -c sun.c
> <command line>error: missing "(" after predicate
> make:***[sun.o] error 1




Remove the "-Ae" option in line 9 of the makefile.
This option is special to HPUX systems.


- Christian
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2008-June/005150.html).</sup>
